summary: After his tribe is slaughtered through an act of treachery, the teenage son of a slain Maori chieftain looks to avenge his father's murder and bring peace and honor to the souls of his loved ones.
cast: James Rolleston|Lawrence Makoare|Te Kohe Tuhaka|Xavier Horan|Raukura Turei|George Henare|Rena Owen|Pana Hema Taylor|Calvin Tuteao|Jamus Webster|Bianca Hyslop|Isabella Rakete|Matariki Whatarau|Wairangi Koopu|Jeff Ruha|Kani Collier|Te Manahau Morrison|Mere Boynton|Maria Walker|Ria Paki|Taupunakohe Tocker|Thomas Kiwi|Tori Marsh|Antonio Te Maioha|Kimo Houltham|Ngarino Watt|Rob Kipa-Williams|Eds Eramiha|Siaosi Fonua|Stephen Grey|Jeremy Hollis|Nooroa Poa
title: Tierra de guerreros
